p: Lignans are divided into several subgroups including arylnaphthalene, aryltetralin, dibenzylbutane, dibenzylbutyrolactone, and furofuran ( Simpson and Amos, 2017). Among the classes, the aryltetralins have attracted significant interest, in particular, podophyllotoxin ( 124). This compound exhibits a remarkable anti-cancer effect and is the precursor of the semisynthetic anticancer drugs teniposide and etoposide.
